descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Pinball Blasted into the Future!

**Play challenging and addictive arcade gameplay from inside the machine. It’s pinball like you've never seen before!**

Wield your hands as paddles, guiding the ball through four immersive pinball worlds, each with their own challenges and surprises. Nostalgic and frantic elements of classic pinball join all-new skills for a fast-paced arcade experience. 
[media]
Trigger the Guide to nudge the ball where you want it to go and activate Attract to magnetically pull the ball back to you, all for the ultimate skill shots. 

**Unique mini-games bring each pinball table to life:**
[media]
- **Gunpowder Gulch** - Rob a dusty town while dodging the law in a thrilling Wild West heist. Test your aim through safe-cracking, barrages of flying barrels, and shootouts where your paddles transform into pistols to fend off deputies.
- **Asteroid Outpost** - Survive the perils of deep space mining as you harvest Arcadium from asteroids. Repair your ship and unleash multiball chaos!
- **Monster Manor** - Explore a haunted mansion filled with eerie surprises and restless spirits. Light candles, catch ghosts, and battle monstrous forces as you uncover the secrets of the mysterious manor.
- **Pirate’s Plunder** - Sail the high seas and pillage your way to glory in this swashbuckling adventure. Load the cannons, conquer your naval rivals, and plunder treasure as you raise the Jolly Roger and fend off a swarm of skeletons!

# Experience chaotic pinball action, flipped inside out!
